section.title: Stomp and StompConnect
section.para: Stomp is a wire protocol that allows stomp clients from to communicate with Stomp Brokers. Using StompConnect it is possible to turn JBM into a Stomp Broker and use any of the available stomp clients. These include clients written in C, C++, c# and .net etc. For more information on Stomp and StompConnect go to
To run Stomp first start the JBoss Messaging server and make sure that it is using JNDI.
